DOC.brief_title: Cardiovascular Effects Growth Hormone Therapy Adults With Growth Hormone Deficiency
DOC.criteria: Adult growth hormone deficiency At least 2 year without growth hormone treatment Supine blood pressure 160 mmHg systolic 100 mmHg diastolic Pregnancy
